original_text: He told them still another parable: “The kingdom of heaven is like yeast that a woman took and mixed into about sixty pounds of flour until it worked all through the dough.”
korean_text: 또 비유로 말씀하시되 천국은 마치 여자가 가루 서 말 속에 갖다 넣어 전부 부풀게 한 누룩과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: He told them still another parable:
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들에게 또 다른 비유를 말씀하셨습니다:

sentences.original_text: The kingdom of heaven is like yeast
and mixed into about sixty pounds of flour
until it worked all through the dough.
